DLG ITM_1

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - A lovely cup of tea!
  - Tea! \o/
  - Another cup of tea! :D
  - Collecting tea does nothing by the way. It just makes me feel good :D
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
{shuffle
  - ORDERLY DROID: 'ello!

  - ORDERLY DROID: BZZZZT!

  - ORDERLY DROID: BEEP!

}{shuffle
  -  SEE THE ROBOT NURSE.

  -  THE NURSE WILL HELP.

  -  I AM SUPER! SUPER FLUOUS!
  -  IGNORE ME!
  -  {wvy}*BEEP*{wvy}
  -  WE'RE DOOMED!
  -  DOES NOT COMPUTE.
}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
{shuffle
  - ROBOT NURSE: THE DOCTOR WILL SEE YOU NOW!!!
  - ROBOT NURSE: YOU MAY ENTER!!!
  - ROBOT NURSE: GO IN, HUMAN!!!
  - ROBOT NURSE: DOCTOR ROBOT WILL SEE YOU NOW!!!
  - ROBOT NURSE: WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
  - ROBOT NURSE: GET IN!
  - ROBOT NURSE: IN YOU GO, HUMAN.
  - ROBOT NURSE: {rbw}DOCTOR ROBOT IS NEARLY 100 YEARS OLD.{rbw}
  - ROBOT NURSE: DOCTOR ROBOT IS IN!
  - ROBOT NURSE: GO INSIDE!
}
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{shuffle
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} STATE SYMPTOMS, HUMAN.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} STATE SYMPTOMS, HUMAN.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WHAT AILS YOU, HUMAN?
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WHY ARE YOU HERE, FLESHY ONE?
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU AGAIN, HUMAN? REALLY?
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU ARE A MESS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} GREETINGS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WHAT IS WRONG, HUMAN?
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} DECLARE SYMPTOMS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU AGAIN, HUMAN? HMMM...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WHAT IS YOUR MALFUNCTION?
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} SECURITY SCAN...
    

}{shuffle
  - YOU: My leg hurts...
    

  - YOU: I have a pain in my tummy.
    

  - YOU: I stubbed my toe :(
    

  - YOU: I feel very down :(
    

  - YOU: My back is killing me!
    

  - YOU: My head hurts...
    

  - YOU: My brother is a chicken :O
    

  - YOU: I ran out of tea :(
    

  - YOU: I crashed my spaceship...
    

  - YOU: It's hard to breathe...
    

  - YOU: I don't feel so good... :(
    

  - YOU: I keep sneezing...
    

  - YOU: I have a cough :(
    

  - YOU: I can't sleep... :(
    

  - YOU: My life sucks... :(
    

  - YOU: My arms hurt... :(
    

  - YOU: My toes itch...
    

  - YOU: My hip aches :(
    

  - YOU: I am sore all over :(
    

  - YOU: I can't feel my fingers :(
    

  - YOU: My dog has no nose... :(
    

  - YOU: I ate a Tide pod...
    

  - YOU: I swallowed a fly...
    

  - YOU: I fell off the floor...
    

  - YOU: I can't see...
    

  - YOU: You're so big!
    

}{shuffle
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} SCANNING...
    
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} ANALYSING...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} COLLATING...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WORKING...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} 
    POKE 34785,N
    

}{shuffle
  - YOU: What's wrong with me?
    

  - YOU: Will I be ok?
    

  - YOU: Is it serious?
    

  - YOU: What are my chances?
    

  - YOU: All ok?
    

  - YOU: Will I be ok?
    

  - YOU: Can you do anything?
    
    
    

  - YOU: What's the damage?
    

  - YOU: It hurts!
    

  - YOU: Am I ok?
    

  - YOU: So? What now???
    

  - YOU: Why so serious?
    

  - YOU: Prognosis, Doctor?
    

  - YOU: Women don't like me...
    

  - YOU: I have no friends...
    

  - YOU: Er...
    

}{shuffle
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WE NEED TO AMPUTATE YOUR LEG.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} DRINK MORE WATER.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU ARE FINE.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} DON'T MAKE ANY LONG-TERM PLANS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} NURSE. PREPARE THE SAW.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} NURSE. MORE OIL.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOUR SURVIVAL PROBABILITY IS 2%
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOUR SURVIVAL PROBABILITY IS 45%
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOUR SURVIVAL PROBABILITY IS 100% NO.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOUR SURVIVAL PROBABILITY IS 69%
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} I WILL TAKE YOUR EYES.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOUR EARS WILL MAKE NICE EARRINGS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} MAKE A WILL.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU HAVE 24 HOURS TO LIVE.

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} NOT ALL WILL BE SAVED.

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} IT IS NOT GOOD NEWS.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} OH DEAR...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YIKES.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} DO NOT MOVE.

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} OH NO...
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WE NEED TO TAKE OFF YOUR HEAD.

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} WE NEED TO OPEN YOU UP.
    

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} YOU MUST BE CLEANSED.

  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} ...
    

}{shuffle

  - YOU: Say it's not so! :(
    

  - YOU: That's awful!
    

  - YOU: Oh...
    

  - YOU: Really?
    

  - YOU: But...
    
    
    

  - YOU: So...

DLG SPR_3
"""
{shuffle
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} DO NOT TOUCH ME, HUMAN.
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} STOP THAT!
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} LEAVE THIS PLACE, HUMAN.
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} OI!
  - {clr3}DOCTOR ROBOT:{clr3} THE DOCTOR IS NOT FOR TOUCHING!
}
"""

END 0
VISIT DOCTOR ROBOT IF OPERATING AT LESS THAN 30% CAPACITY.

END 1
DOCTOR ROBOT IS ALWAYS IN!

VAR a
42
